name: Introdemo (Your Introduction to Demonomics)
description:
This is the demo for Introdemo, or, if you want to call it by its longer title, Your introduction to Demonomics. It's about the story of a punk rock idol and a late night TV show host begrudgingly joining forces to solve the biggest murder mystery of the decade. It's the 70s, little fool, don't forget the golden rule.

It's also about: a boy and his giant dog, baseball, card games, romance novels, getting grounded and missing the Fennel concert, and demons too, I guess. 

this version of the demo is almost 15,000 words long and it includes two minigames (a pop quiz and a three card monte), animations, and tons of art!

full game will also include:
  • a cool original ost
  • more paths, more choices, more chances to get a good or bad end
  • word puzzles
  • well...more minigames!
  • more animations
  • more horror
  • more characters
  • more demons and vampires (?!)

(and if you have time, feel free to fill out this survey after playing the game)
